value: Browser tabs use one webview per tab (not shared). Each tab creates its own native webview with unique label 'browser-{tabId}'. Switching tabs hides previous webview and shows new one via show()/hide(), preserving full state (scroll, forms, session). Files: browser.rs (BrowserState with HashMap<tab_id, label>), browserService.ts (tabStates Map), BrowserPanel.tsx (webviewCreated flag per tab). CSS fix: removed flex:1 from .browser-tabs so + button stays next to last tab.
